entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.7°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
